bio:treatment.description: Pinnae without white or pale green, longitudinal streak along middle; sterile pinnae less than 10 mm wide, fertile segments less than 8 mm wide; terminal pinna somewhat to barely decurrent on rachis.

statement.text: Terrestrial or on rock in rocky hammocks, limesinks, grottoes, and river bluffs;

character.name: habitat
character.constraint: in rocky hammocks , limesinks , grottoes , and river bluffs ;

bio:treatment.description: introduced; Fla., La.; widely scattered worldwide in tropical and subtropical regions.

key_statement.description: Pinnae green throughout. 5a. Pteris cretica var. cretica
Pinnae with broad, white, central stripe. 5b. Pteris cretica var. albolineata
